sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"创造，制作"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: create, compose, design, invent, make, produce
means: create ： 侧重创造出来的东西以前并不存在，或者指独具特色的创作。
compose ： 多指音乐或诗歌、画的创作。
design ： 主要指在艺术或技术领域的创作设计，强调构思多于实际制造。
invent ： 主要用于科技领域，指通过思考、研究或实验制造出新的前所未有、极为有用的东西。
make ： 最普通用词，指任何东西的创作或制造。
produce ： 指产品的生产，或作品创作的完成。

sentence.Network_en: His father had helped invent a whole new way of doing business.
sentence.Network_cn: 他父亲帮助创造了一套全新的生意经。

sentence.Network_en: We have to invent a new method for sneaking prisoners out without being noticed by the guards.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须想出新的办法使囚犯们偷偷溜出去而不被看守发现.

sentence.Network_en: I stood still, trying to invent a plausible excuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我站着不动，试图编个说得过去的借口。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 九年级英语单词表 ... donate 捐赠；赠送 invent 发明；创造 calculator 计算机.
一段情两颗❤ 三个字 。 ... devise 指小型机械设备 invent 捏造，虚构 invent a story 捏造一个故事.
捏字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 捏一把汗〖 beseizedwithfear〗 捏造〖 fabricate;concoct;fake;invent〗 捏 niē.
introduction n. 介绍；引言invent v. 发明；首创例如：Laszlo Biro invented the ball-point pen.拉斯洛?拜罗发.

list.abs: 词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Improve 改善，改进 Invention 发明 Illness 疾病.
音乐理论_百度百科 ... 131、轮唱曲（ Round） 132、创意曲（invention）（ Invention） 133、练声曲（ Vocalization）.
FCE与BETS3高频阅读重点词汇下载_英语网 ... Factual 事实的, 实际的 Inventive 善于创造的, 发明的 Self-righteous 自以为是的.
英文后缀_百度文库 ... hard→hardship 艰难 - invent→inventive 有发明才能的 - terrify→terrific 可怕的 -.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'find out, discover'): from Latin invent- 'contrived, discovered', from the verb invenire, from in- 'into' + venire 'come'

entry.def: If you invent something such as a machine or process, you are the first person to think of it or make it.

example.ex: He invented the first electric clock...
example.tran: 他发明了第一个电动机械钟。

example.ex: Writing had not been invented as yet.
example.tran: 书写体系当时还没有创造出来。

entry.def: If you invent a story or excuse, you try to make other people believe that it is true when in fact it is not.

example.ex: I stood still, trying to invent a plausible excuse.
example.tran: 我站着不动,试图编个说得过去的借口。

means.word_mean: 1. come up with (an idea, plan, explanation, theory, or priciple) after a mental effort;

sentences.sentence: "excogitate a way to measure the speed of light"

means.word_mean: 2. make up something artificial or untrue

auth_sentence.content: If anyone can invent a better battery IBM can.
auth_sentence.res_content: If anyone can invent a better battery IBM can.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If anyone can invent a better battery IBM can.

auth_sentence.content: We needed something, we had to invent it.
auth_sentence.res_content: We needed something, we had to invent it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We needed something, we had to invent it.

auth_sentence.content: We invent Gods for events we cannot explain.
auth_sentence.res_content: We invent Gods for events we cannot explain.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备

Sentence.sentence: Decades ago, Kodak anticipated that digital photography would overtake film — and in fact, Kodak invented the first digital camera in 1975 — but in a fateful decision, the company chose to shelf its new discovery to focus on its traditional film business.
He invented lots of functional gadgets.
Writing was only invented 5,500 years ago.
We can invent computers capable of processing ten million calculations per second.
It was invented by a group of language experts in the year of 1887.

jushi.english: The game of rugby was invented when a boy at the school, tired of kicking the ball, picked it up and ran with it.
jushi.chinese: 学校里一个男孩子踢球踢烦了,捡起球抱着跑起来了,就这样发明了橄榄球。

jushi.english: Edison invented the electric light lamp.
